resources.string: NFC Inventory can\'t be used without NFC enabled. Please turn on NFC in the Settings and then use the back button to return to this app.
Scan the NFC tag on the computer for information on its internals. Use the editable text fields below to make changes and click the update button to re-flash the NFC tag.
Read tag and replace currently displayed tag information in the textfields?
Ready to write to NFC tag!
Touch your device to a computer\'s tag to update its inventory.
Touch your device a tag to write.
